cab.content: (Military Secret. 973/ From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,(pl^ . 3rd July V,m.(Received 4th, .10.30 a.m.)8996. No. 53. Part 1.(1.) Dakka reports some increase in tribal gatherings about Basawal after Id.(2) Dardoni reports some sniping night of' Jst-2nd July and that party of 200 Mahsuds arrived at Spalga south-east of Miranshah. Afghan frontier officials appear to be still intriguing with Mahsuds.(3) Cutting of telegraph lines vicinity.of Fort Sandeman and burning of some Government buildings as isolated occurrences by raiding gangs is reported.Part 2.(4) Health of troops satisfactory on the whole. Cholera has markedly decreased, only 11 cases having occurred in whole of force during past four clays.Communicated to Press except latter portion of para. 2.
